attributes.action: Stop giving taxpayers money to China.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A quote from a BBC news article (Thursday, 12 March 2009): "The superpower, which spent £20bn on last year's Beijing Olympics, received more than £38m in British aid in 2007." 

 China has a significantly larger economy than us now as is set to become the largest economy in the world by 2050.

Shadow international development secretary Andrew Mitchell said: "British taxpayers need to know that their aid money is helping the poorest people in the world, not going to countries which have enough money to tackle poverty themselves." 

Surely there are countries far more in need of our aid money than China?
